message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $250.
I'm interested in the product, but $250 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $125 for it.
I understand that $250 might be a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $200.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $200 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $150 for the product.
I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $175.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $175 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product.
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $165.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but $165 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $140.50 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $157.50.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but $157.50 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $141.75 for the product.
